Text: hey, uhmm i had a problem, the installer worked up till a point at which it said the game wasnt verified, i put the crack folder into the install destination although still doesnt work, this happens just before the installer ends, so if you could please help me it would be much appreciated
when i launch the game it ask me for a registration code .. where can i get it i try the keygen and nothing???

Just to clear up a few things:
 Navigate to the Crack Folder and run rld-bupk.exe and generate a key that you can copy and paste into the setup
 You must copy all the other contents in the crack folder into wherever you have installed the game ( C:// ....) 

 Execute the EA setup application
 Follow the setup to install
 When you are asked for a key use the keygen found in the crack folder on the same virtual device.
 If your game crashes, run in compatibility mode with Service Pack 3.
